title: Tracks - The Train Set Game
notes: Starts then crashes with error dialog 'DX11 feature level 10.0 is required to run the engine.'
specs: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-8100 CPU @ 3.60GHz / Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) UHD Graphics 630 (Coffeelake 3x8 GT2) x86/MMX/SSE2

title: Tracks - The Train Set Game
notes: Right click on the game in the game list, select Properties then SET LAUNCH OPTIONS... enter PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command% in the text box - Source: https://github.com/ValveSoftware/Proton/issues/671#issuecomment-416040448 - Thanks to pprotonrep@ on github.
specs: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-8100 CPU @ 3.60GHz / Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) UHD Graphics 630 (Coffeelake 3x8 GT2) x86/MMX/SSE2
